actions.description: Your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 + PB piercing damage or 1d6 + 2 + PB bludgeoning damage (your choice), and the target is grappled (escape DC equal to your spellcasting save DC). Until this grapple ends, the beast can't use this attack on another target
actions.name: Blinding Strike

languages: understands the languages its owner speaks
name: Beast of the Sea

specialTraits.description: The beast can breathe both air and water
specialTraits.name: Amphibious

specialTraits.description: You can add the beast owner's proficiency bonus to any ability check or saving throw that the beast makes
specialTraits.name: Primal Bond
